author: Hilton John
post_text: November 5, 2018 at 6:58 PM#1Hi,I have a row of 12 fixtures and i'm trying to do a macro for select fixtures with a wing of 2 and be able to move the pan with align >< without taping align each time. I saw someone use a macro like that but I can't find the good way to create it.Any ideas?Thx
title: Wing 2 with align ><
